Posts.Content: tartie_pants wrote: So I just wanted to share my biggest no surgery brightside and it has been my biggest one for 4.5 years. Riding rollercoasters is a heck of alot more comfortable when you dont have boobs. Silly but true. Dx 12/5/2009, 6cm+, Stage IV, 3/4 nodes, mets, ER+/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 12/20/2009 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 6/16/2010 Lymph node removal: Left, Right, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left, Right; Prophylactic ovary removal Radiation Therapy 8/5/2010 3DCRT: Breast Hormonal Therapy Femara (letrozole) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Rollercoaster of love tartie_pants Ariom
